self.name: setClientDHParams
self.description: Request containing encrypted client-side variables for Diffie-Hellman exchange
self.descriptionExcerpt: Request containing encrypted client-side variables for Diffie-Hellman exchange

arguments.name: encryptedData
arguments.description:
Encrypted DH parameters, obtained as follows:
  • Let B be a random 2048-bit (256 bytes) integer
  • gB = g ^ B % dhPrime (Diffie-Hellman)
  • Let data be a serialization of mtproto/client_DH_inner_data
  • dataWithHash = concat(sha1(data), data, padding)), where padding is 0-15 random bytes, such that dataWithHash.length is divisible by 16
  • encryptedData = aes256_ige_encrypt(dataWithHash, key, iv), where key and iv are the same as ones used in mtproto/server_DH_params_ok
